title: Life of a Lotus
description: A love story set against the tumultuous backdrop of a South Asian country, where a provincial governor is assassinated, the daughter of a prominent political family is murdered, and hundreds of soldiers are tragically buried in an avalanche. Our protagonists find themselves caught in the crossfire of these events. This novel delves into the deep-rooted corruption within the political, journalistic, and judicial spheres of a developing nation.
author: Adeerus Ghayan
